content: animal eyeglass holder materials worsted weight yarn size g 4 00 mm crochet hook stitch marker yarn needle scissor abbreviations chain = chain inv decrease = invisible decrease single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch increase = increase base - with main color slip knot chain 19 round 1 single_crochet into second chain from hook 16 single_crochet 3 single_crochet in the same stitch 16 single_crochet increase in the same chain you crocheted the first single_crochet slip_stitch into the first stitch chain 1 do not turn round 2 increase 16 single_crochet increase 3 times 16 single_crochet increase 2 times slip_stitch into the first stitch chain 1 do not turn round 3 single_crochet increase 16 single_crochet single_crochet increase 3 times 16 single_crochet single_crochet increase 2 times slip_stitch into the first stitch chain 1 do not turn round 4 2sc increase 16 single_crochet 2 single_crochet increase 3 times 16 single_crochet 2 single_crochet increase 2 times slip_stitch into the first stitch chain 1 do not turn round 5 3 single_crochet increase 16 single_crochet 3 single_crochet increase 3 times 16 single_crochet 3 single_crochet increase 2 times slip_stitch into the first stitch chain 1 do not turn round 6 4 single_crochet increase 16 single_crochet 4 single_crochet increase 3 times 16 single_crochet 4 single_crochet increase 2 times slip_stitch into the first stitch fasten_off using a stitch marker mark the stitch in the middle of the oval in the last row with back side up insert the hook in the stitch 3 to the left of your marked stitch row 1 63 single_crochet until you reach the stitch before the stitch marker on the right 5 stitches not worked turn row 2 slip_stitch around the 63 stitches from round 7 fasten_off nose - with white round 1 6 single_crochet into a magic_ring slip_stitch into the first stitch chain 1 round 2 increase 6 times slip_stitch into the first stitch chain 1 round 3 2sc increase 3 times slip_stitch into the first stitch chain 1 round 4 18 single_crochet slip_stitch into the first stitch chain 1 round 5 inv decrease x 4 single_crochet 2 times slip_stitch into first stitch fasten_off leaving long tail stuff nose and close while sewing to the skipped stitches in rounds 7 & 8 embroider nose ears - make 2 with main color round 1 5 single_crochet into a magic_ring chain 1 and turn round 2 increase 5 times chain 1 and turn round 3 10 single_crochet fasten_off leaving long tail eyes - make 2 with black round 1 6 single_crochet into magic_ring slip_stitch into first stitch fasten_off leaving long tail add the eyes between row 1 and 2
